# Introduction

Ce document pr√©sente un storytelling complet des donn√©es Bitcoin horaires (`btc_hourly_ohclv_ta.csv`) √† travers 7 actes : contexte, volatilit√©, volume, momentum, tendances, ratios et synth√®se.

## Setup : Packages & donn√©es

```{r setup}
#| label: setup
#| include: true

options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"))

# Packages n√©cessaires

```

```{r load-data}
#| label: load-data

# Lecture CSV
csv_path <- "btc_hourly_ohclv_ta.csv"
stopifnot(file.exists(csv_path))

df <- read_csv(csv_path, show_col_types = FALSE)

cat("Dataset charg√© :", nrow(df), "lignes,", ncol(df), "colonnes\n")
```

## Pr√©traitement

```{r preprocessing}
#| label: preprocessing

# Trouver les colonnes cl√©s (insensible √† la casse)
cn <- names(df)
cn_lc <- tolower(cn)
find_col <- function(cands) {
  i <- which(cn_lc %in% tolower(cands))
  if (length(i) == 0) return(NA_integer_)
  i[1]
}

idx_time   <- find_col(c("datetime","date","timestamp","time","open_time","close_time"))
idx_open   <- find_col(c("open"))
idx_high   <- find_col(c("high"))
idx_low    <- find_col(c("low"))
idx_close  <- find_col(c("close","close_price","closing_price"))
idx_volume <- find_col(c("volume","vol","quote_volume"))

dt <- as_tibble(df)
if (!is.na(idx_time)) {
  time_raw <- df[[idx_time]]
  if (!inherits(time_raw, "POSIXct")) {
    tt <- suppressWarnings(lubridate::ymd_hms(time_raw, tz = "UTC"))
    if (all(is.na(tt))) tt <- suppressWarnings(lubridate::ymd_hm(time_raw, tz = "UTC"))
    if (all(is.na(tt))) tt <- suppressWarnings(lubridate::parse_date_time(time_raw, orders = c("Ymd HMS","Ymd HM","Y-m-d H:M:S","dmy HMS","dmy HM","ymd"), tz = "UTC"))
    time_parsed <- tt
  } else {
    time_parsed <- time_raw
  }
  dt <- dt %>% mutate(datetime = time_parsed)
}
if (!is.na(idx_open))   dt <- dt %>% mutate(open  = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(df[[idx_open]])))
if (!is.na(idx_high))   dt <- dt %>% mutate(high  = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(df[[idx_high]])))
if (!is.na(idx_low))    dt <- dt %>% mutate(low   = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(df[[idx_low]])))
if (!is.na(idx_close))  dt <- dt %>% mutate(close = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(df[[idx_close]])))
if (!is.na(idx_volume)) dt <- dt %>% mutate(volume = suppressWarnings(as.numeric(df[[idx_volume]])))

if ("datetime" %in% names(dt)) dt <- dt %>% arrange(datetime)

# Fen√™tres
window_short <- 20L
window_fast  <- 12L
window_slow  <- 26L
window_sig   <- 9L
window_vol30d <- 720L  # 30j * 24h

# Returns (PRICE_CHANGE)
if ("close" %in% names(dt)) {
  dt <- dt %>% mutate(PRICE_CHANGE = close/lag(close) - 1)
}

# ATR (n=14)
if (all(c("high","low","close") %in% names(dt))) {
  atr_df <- TTR::ATR(cbind(dt$high, dt$low, dt$close), n = 14)
  dt$ATR <- as.numeric(atr_df[,"atr"])
}

# RSI (n=14)
if ("close" %in% names(dt)) {
  dt$RSI <- as.numeric(TTR::RSI(dt$close, n = 14))
}

# SMA/EMA, MACD
if ("close" %in% names(dt)) {
  dt$SMA_20 <- as.numeric(TTR::SMA(dt$close, n = window_short))
  dt$EMA_12 <- as.numeric(TTR::EMA(dt$close, n = window_fast))
  dt$EMA_26 <- as.numeric(TTR::EMA(dt$close, n = window_slow))
  macd <- TTR::MACD(dt$close, nFast = window_fast, nSlow = window_slow, nSig = window_sig)
  dt$MACD <- as.numeric(macd[ ,"macd"]) 
  dt$MACD_SIGNAL <- as.numeric(macd[ ,"signal"]) 
}

# Rolling volatility 30 jours
if ("PRICE_CHANGE" %in% names(dt)) {
  dt$VOLATILITY_30D <- as.numeric(zoo::rollapply(dt$PRICE_CHANGE, width = window_vol30d, FUN = sd, align = "right", fill = NA, na.rm = TRUE))
  dt$PRICE_VOLATILITY_30D <- dt$VOLATILITY_30D
}

# VOLUME_SMA
if ("volume" %in% names(dt)) {
  dt$VOLUME_SMA <- as.numeric(TTR::SMA(dt$volume, n = window_short))
}

# Ratios
if (all(c("high","low","close") %in% names(dt))) {
  dt$HIGH_LOW_RATIO <- (dt$high - dt$low) / dt$close
}
if (all(c("close","open") %in% names(dt))) {
  dt$CLOSE_OPEN_RATIO <- dt$close/dt$open - 1
}

# Stochastique
if (all(c("high","low","close") %in% names(dt))) {
  st <- suppressWarnings(TTR::stoch(cbind(dt$high, dt$low, dt$close)))
  if (!is.null(st)) {
    dt$STOCH_K <- as.numeric(st[,"fastK"]) * 100
    dt$STOCH_D <- as.numeric(st[,"fastD"]) * 100
  }
}

cat("Pr√©traitement termin√©.\n")
```

# üé¨ Acte 1 ‚Äî Le contexte : "Une d√©cennie de Bitcoin"

**Message:** Bitcoin est pass√© d'un actif marginal √† un march√© hautement volatil et liquide.

## Statistiques globales

```{r acte1-stats}
#| label: acte1-stats

stopifnot(all(c("datetime","close") %in% names(dt)))

rng <- range(dt$datetime, na.rm = TRUE)
n_hours <- sum(!is.na(dt$datetime))
price_min <- min(dt$close, na.rm = TRUE)
price_median <- median(dt$close, na.rm = TRUE)
price_max <- max(dt$close, na.rm = TRUE)
vol_total <- if ("volume" %in% names(dt)) sum(dt$volume, na.rm = TRUE) else NA_real_

tibble(
  M√©trique = c("P√©riode d√©but", "P√©riode fin", "Heures totales", "Prix min", "Prix m√©dian", "Prix max", "Volume total"),
  Valeur = c(
    format(rng[1]),
    format(rng[2]),
    prettyNum(n_hours, big.mark = " "),
    prettyNum(round(price_min, 2), big.mark = " "),
    prettyNum(round(price_median, 2), big.mark = " "),
    prettyNum(round(price_max, 2), big.mark = " "),
    if (!is.na(vol_total)) prettyNum(round(vol_total, 0), big.mark = " ") else "N/A"
  )
) %>% kable()
```

## Visualisations

```{r acte1-plots}
#| label: acte1-plots
#| fig-height: 8

p1 <- ggplot(dt, aes(x = datetime, y = close)) +
  geom_line(color = "#2C7FB8", linewidth = 0.3) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  labs(title = "Prix horaire du Bitcoin (CLOSE)", x = "Date", y = "Prix (USD)") +
  theme_minimal()

p2 <- ggplot(dt, aes(x = close)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 60, fill = "#7FCDBB", color = "grey30") +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  labs(title = "Distribution des prix (CLOSE)", x = "Prix (USD)", y = "Fr√©quence") +
  theme_minimal()

p1 / p2
```

**Conclusion:** La croissance n'est pas lin√©aire ‚Üí phases d'explosion et de stagnation.

# üé¨ Acte 2 ‚Äî La volatilit√© : l'ADN du Bitcoin

**Message:** La volatilit√© est une constante, mais son intensit√© change selon les p√©riodes.

## Statistiques

```{r acte2-stats}
#| label: acte2-stats

stats_vol <- list()

if ("ATR" %in% names(dt)) {
  stats_vol$ATR_moyen <- mean(dt$ATR, na.rm = TRUE)
  stats_vol$ATR_max <- max(dt$ATR, na.rm = TRUE)
}

if ("VOLATILITY_30D" %in% names(dt)) {
  stats_vol$VOL30D_moyen <- mean(dt$VOLATILITY_30D, na.rm = TRUE)
  stats_vol$VOL30D_max <- max(dt$VOLATILITY_30D, na.rm = TRUE)
  
  if ("datetime" %in% names(dt)) {
    dt_clean <- dt %>% filter(!is.na(VOLATILITY_30D), !is.na(datetime))
    mid_date <- median(dt_clean$datetime, na.rm = TRUE)
    early <- dt_clean %>% filter(datetime < mid_date)
    recent <- dt_clean %>% filter(datetime >= mid_date)
    stats_vol$VOL_early <- mean(early$VOLATILITY_30D, na.rm = TRUE)
    stats_vol$VOL_recent <- mean(recent$VOLATILITY_30D, na.rm = TRUE)
  }
}

as_tibble(stats_vol) %>%
  pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "M√©trique", values_to = "Valeur") %>%
  mutate(Valeur = signif(Valeur, 4)) %>%
  kable()
```

## Visualisations

```{r acte2-plots}
#| label: acte2-plots
#| fig-height: 12

plots <- list()

if ("VOLATILITY_30D" %in% names(dt) && "datetime" %in% names(dt)) {
  dt_clean <- dt %>% filter(!is.na(VOLATILITY_30D), !is.na(datetime))
  
  plots$p1 <- ggplot(dt_clean, aes(x = datetime, y = VOLATILITY_30D)) +
    geom_line(color = "#E31A1C", linewidth = 0.4) +
    labs(title = "Volatilit√© 30 jours (rolling SD)", x = "Date", y = "Volatilit√©") +
    theme_minimal()
  
  dt_clean <- dt_clean %>% mutate(year = lubridate::year(datetime))
  plots$p2 <- ggplot(dt_clean, aes(x = factor(year), y = VOLATILITY_30D)) +
    geom_boxplot(fill = "#FF7F00", alpha = 0.7) +
    labs(title = "Distribution volatilit√© par ann√©e", x = "Ann√©e", y = "Volatilit√© 30D") +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
  
  plots$p3 <- ggplot(dt_clean, aes(x = VOLATILITY_30D)) +
    geom_histogram(bins = 50, fill = "#FB9A99", color = "grey30") +
    labs(title = "Distribution VOLATILITY_30D", x = "Volatilit√©", y = "Fr√©quence") +
    theme_minimal()
  
  wrap_plots(plots, ncol = 1)
}
```

**Conclusion:** Le march√© m√ªrit, mais reste instable ‚Üí opportunit√© & risque.

# üé¨ Acte 3 ‚Äî Le volume : quand le march√© s'emballe

**Message:** Le volume raconte l'histoire des crises et des bull runs.

## Statistiques

```{r acte3-stats}
#| label: acte3-stats

if ("volume" %in% names(dt)) {
  vol_stats <- tibble(
    M√©trique = c("Volume moyen", "Volume m√©dian", "Top 1% (quantile 99%)"),
    Valeur = c(
      prettyNum(round(mean(dt$volume, na.rm = TRUE), 0), big.mark = " "),
      prettyNum(round(median(dt$volume, na.rm = TRUE), 0), big.mark = " "),
      prettyNum(round(quantile(dt$volume, 0.99, na.rm = TRUE), 0), big.mark = " ")
    )
  )
  
  if ("PRICE_CHANGE" %in% names(dt)) {
    dt_clean <- dt %>% filter(!is.na(volume), !is.na(PRICE_CHANGE))
    if (nrow(dt_clean) > 2) {
      corr <- cor(dt_clean$volume, abs(dt_clean$PRICE_CHANGE), use = "complete.obs")
      vol_stats <- vol_stats %>% add_row(
        M√©trique = "Corr√©lation VOLUME ‚Üî |PRICE_CHANGE|",
        Valeur = as.character(signif(corr, 3))
      )
    }
  }
  
  vol_stats %>% kable()
}
```

## Visualisations

```{r acte3-plots}
#| label: acte3-plots
#| fig-height: 12

if ("volume" %in% names(dt) && "datetime" %in% names(dt)) {
  dt_clean <- dt %>% filter(!is.na(volume), !is.na(datetime))
  
  p1 <- ggplot(dt_clean, aes(x = datetime, y = volume)) +
    geom_line(color = "#1F78B4", linewidth = 0.3) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
    labs(title = "Volume horaire", x = "Date", y = "Volume") +
    theme_minimal()
  
  p2 <- NULL
  if ("PRICE_CHANGE" %in% names(dt)) {
    dt_clean2 <- dt_clean %>% filter(!is.na(PRICE_CHANGE)) %>%
      mutate(abs_change = abs(PRICE_CHANGE))
    p2 <- ggplot(dt_clean2 %>% sample_n(min(10000, nrow(dt_clean2))), 
                 aes(x = volume, y = abs_change)) +
      geom_point(alpha = 0.2, color = "#A6CEE3") +
      scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
      labs(title = "Volume vs |PRICE_CHANGE|", x = "Volume", y = "|Variation|") +
      theme_minimal()
  }
  
  if (!is.null(p2)) {
    p1 / p2
  } else {
    p1
  }
}
```

**Conclusion:** Les grands mouvements de prix sont presque toujours accompagn√©s de volumes anormaux.

# üé¨ Acte 5 ‚Äî Tendances & r√©gimes

**Message:** Bitcoin alterne entre tendance et range.

## Statistiques

```{r acte5-stats}
#| label: acte5-stats

stats_list <- list()

if (all(c("close","SMA_20") %in% names(dt))) {
  dt_clean <- dt %>% filter(!is.na(close), !is.na(SMA_20))
  stats_list$pct_above_sma <- paste0(signif(mean(dt_clean$close > dt_clean$SMA_20) * 100, 3), "%")
}

if (all(c("EMA_12","EMA_26") %in% names(dt))) {
  dt_clean <- dt %>% filter(!is.na(EMA_12), !is.na(EMA_26))
  stats_list$pct_ema_cross <- paste0(signif(mean(dt_clean$EMA_12 > dt_clean$EMA_26) * 100, 3), "%")
}

if (length(stats_list) > 0) {
  tibble(
    M√©trique = c("% temps CLOSE > SMA_20", "% temps EMA_12 > EMA_26"),
    Valeur = unlist(stats_list)
  ) %>% kable()
}
```

## Visualisations

```{r acte5-plots}
#| label: acte5-plots
#| fig-height: 12

plots <- list()

if (all(c("close","SMA_20","datetime") %in% names(dt))) {
  dt_clean <- dt %>% filter(!is.na(close), !is.na(SMA_20), !is.na(datetime))
  plots$p1 <- ggplot(dt_clean, aes(x = datetime)) +
    geom_line(aes(y = close), color = "#2C7FB8", linewidth = 0.3) +

}

  dt_clean <- dt %>% filter(!is.na(EMA_12), !is.na(EMA_26), !is.na(datetime))
  plots$p2 <- ggplot(dt_clean, aes(x = datetime)) +
    geom_line(aes(y = EMA_12), color = "#FF7F00", linewidth = 0.3) +

    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
```

**Conclusion:** Les tendances existent, mais sont souvent courtes et violentes.

## Conclusion
